name: CloudPassage Halo
description: This app supports variety of investigative actions on CloudPassage Halo.

actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Return package information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns all packages' information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns servers' information for a package
Returns process information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns summary information for all running processes on the server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns all servers' information for a process
Returns vulnerability information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns all vulnerabilities' information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns all servers' information for vulnerability
Returns user information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns all users' information of a server
actions.verbose: At least one parameter out of aws_instance_id, ip and hostname is mandatory. When we get multiple servers with same hostname, we will consider first matching server if in case user only provides the hostname in input paramaters(aws_instance_id/ip/hostname).

actions.description: Returns all servers' information for a user
